Package model.zenGame

Class ModelManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.zenGame.ModelManager
  • public class ModelManager
extends java.lang.Object
    ModelManager manages most of the game features like start or load a game, open the game rules or simply leave the game
    Author:
    Godet Louis-Xavier

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private GameplayZen game
      Game that the user is playing, used when the game has been created or previously load

    • Method Detail

      • newGame

        public void newGame​(java.lang.String gameName,
                    OpponentType opponent,
                    java.lang.String firstName,
                    java.lang.String secondName,
                    TypeOfPawn pawnFirstPlayer,
                    TypeOfPawn pawnSecondPlayer)
        newGame initializes a Zen l'initie game
        Parameters:
        gameName - : the name of the game
        opponent - : the type of opponent that the player wants to play against
        firstName - : the name of the first player
        secondName - : the name of the second player
        pawnFirstPlayer - : the type of pawns selected by the first player
        pawnSecondPlayer - : the type of pawns selected by the second player

      • load

        public void load​(int choice)
          throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Load the game given by the parameter
        Parameters:
        choice - : the index of the save file game to load
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the game is null
